content.title: Balangiga bells to arrive in PH on Dec. 11 - CNN Philippines
content.desc: Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, December 3) — The Balangiga bells would finally return to the Philippines after more than a century in the hands of the United States. Defense Secretary Delfin Lorenzana said Monday during a joint meeting of the Eastern Visayas Regional Development Council, Regional Peace and Order Council, and the Regional Disaster Risk Reduction Management Council that the bells would arrive in the Philippines on December 11. "Your bells of Balangiga are coming back home. They are scheduled to arrive on December 11 to a simple ceremony at Villamor Airbase in the morning," Lo...
